title: Computers: The Friendly Invasion (Captioned)
brief_description: Extraordinary computer, graphics and spectacular scenes from the terrific Disney feature “Tron” illustrate dazzling computer applications and introduce students to a fabulous resource. You will learn how people working with computers, can build a better world in the future.
